website_summaries.verdict: Despite some interesting and useful design tricks, the Lenovo Yoga Tablet 10 is just a good Android tablet at a good price, at a time when there are great options available at great prices.

customer_reviews.title: Love the tablet and the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Bought this for under $200 and received it yesterday. Screen is bright and crisp and android system is responsive. The only con I would have to point out is that, at least in my opinion, the built-in stock launcher makes the tablet layout look and feel messy. This can be easily changed by downloading a different launcher from the app store (I use go launcher) and customizing as you see fit. I am a former android phone owner so I knew that this was an option. However, I do feel for the average tablet user/someone who has not used android before they might not know that this option is available.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I've used virtually every tablet out there so far. This thing is my favorite. Much easier to hold and use then any other, and EVERYONE comments on it (which I always enjoy the attention). Just saw that Lenovo is releasing a new HD+ version with Higher Screen Resolution and Faster processor, so that will be even better. Hope they can keep the great price! I highly recommend this tablet without any hesitations!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared L. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Strong Choice for most
customer_reviews.text: I am a self professed iDrone, but this tablet has made me change my tune. Great form factor, the battery bulge works well to hold as you use it. Awesome battery life. Overall I have no regrets buying this Pros * Battery life * Bright screen. Maybe not as HD as others in class, but fine for most apps and casual viewing of video. * Price. Lots of bang for your buck. * Built in stand is nice. Adds different configurations when using. Con * The app manager sucks. Better alternatives available on the play store for free. Takes a few minutes to change.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless now. Lenovo tech support has provided no response ...
customer_reviews.text: update: 03/12/15 tablet is now no longer functional after running an update received from Lenovo for Kitkat. Bricked the device. Completely useless now. Lenovo tech support has provided no response over the past couple of months. I personally will no longer be purchasing IBM or Lenovo devices because of the recent experience with this. Imagine using a device day after day and then it no longer working after doing running an update for it that was sent by the manufacturer. Definitely feels like a back stab and a loss of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little android tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this tablet since I have gotten it. It runs smooth and has been stable. Battery life is amazing. I have charged it twice now and it seems to always be ready to go when I hit the power button. The actual curve where the battery pack is makes the tablet easy to hold onto and is not an inconvenience even though it is not as sleek looking as some other tablets. Quality construction. There are not cheap feeling plastics on this tablet. It feels very durable and has a nice aluminum body. Screen resolution is not wow-worthy, but it is not noticeably poor either. It is essentially like looking at any normal laptop screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a birthday gift. it is awesome! it does everything an Ipad does and has more features. it holds it charge close to double the time of the Ipad (I know this because i own both) and has a bigger screen. you can also upgrade the memory by buying a 64 GB Micro SD card that plugs into the back to make your total hard drive space to 96 Gbs. i recommend this for everyone to buy. As always the Ipad (and all Apple products for that matter) has its definite pros but this device is a real powerhouse and performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot until it died 17 months after ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot until it died 17 months after purchase. Lightweight, great battery life, connects to wifi quickly, travels well, very responsive. One day, it just wouldn't turn on and wouldn't charge. The excellent Square Trade protection plan sent a prepaid label to their repair facility, where it was deemed it "beyond economical repairs," and trashed it. A $250 check reimbursement check is on its way.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Out There For The Price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this tablet is well worth your time. Easy to use and the features are great. The screen is better than some of the reviews I've seen. Battery life is great. Android is easy to use. The kickstand is a unique feature. Up to 64gb micro SD card extra storage. If you are comparing this to the Mac or Samsung tablets, look no further. Save the money and get this tablet. You will not be sorry. The $200+ price jumps to the "ELITE" tablets is just not worth it. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful product. I personally love the lenovo yoga tab 3. Everything about it made me want to purchase one for my child. But this one (10" version) didn't come with the upgraded version of android which is not supported by apps such as Netflix and Hulu. So I thought perhaps I could run it in the browser but that didn't work either. And the kick stand didn't go the full 180 degrees lime I assumed it would based off of my yoga tab 3 purchase. All in all super beautiful, but I'm going to stick with getting the smaller version for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Prater

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga, A Must Have 10.1 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The unique design and features make this 10.1 tablet a mush have. Having the Lenovo name was enough for me to learn more about it since my main computer is a Lenovo too. The company outs out a quality product with an internal structure built to last. The several angle tilt to use it on a table is fantastic. It is light, but durable. The camera quality is most impressive and the display very sharp. I have decided to purchase Lenovo's All-in-One 23" screen computer. I am expecting a well made machine and a computer that will last for a lengthy time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lauton

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga is Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, especially for the $240.00 price tag. You really can't beat it! The sleek design is great with the different viewing modes. There were some reviews that mentioned problems with resolution and viewing quality...none of which I've encountered. The picture is great. The only issue that I have encountered is the tablet is not compatible with Adobe Flash so I am unable to download Flash to it or view Flash documents. I have to go to my MAC to do that. Other than that ... I would definitely recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she's loved it since day one. It is a very lightweight, easy-to-use, affordable tablet. It's presentation is definitely high level and has nothing to envy other, more renowned brands. With tons of apps to choose from, an easy interface and high battery durability, it has proven an excellent business companion for our business. Presentations, quotes, business plans...You name it and it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: The Rainmaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tablet..!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Yoga Tablet 10 keeps going over the long haul with its off-the-charts battery life. Its battery lasts up to 18 hours so you can go all day — and into the night — without recharging. Also has amazing multiple usage modes. The MediaTek Quad Core Processor (1.2GHz) are enough for me. Great product from Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my Lenovo 10 inch Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I did much research before purchasing my 10" Lenovo Tablet and I am so glad I did. I had a 7" Tablet pior but found it was a strain on my eyes. I could not be happier with my Lenovo! I love the ability to have it stand up by it self, ability to use in many positions with the angled stand, the size of the touch screen keyboard keys, the speed of it booting up, the length of battery charge, quality over all and so much more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loved it
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a steal for the money, and it's quite distinctive and eye-catching. The screen is very good (much better than the Motorola Xoom I'll say), and the built in stand makes a huge difference compared to other tablets. Not only is it easier to handle, but you can set it up hands free and watch a quick show anywhere. The recipient will take this around the house and watch a favorite show while cooking, sipping a glass of wine in the living room etc.
customer_reviews.author: Neatfreak

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: In days where all Android tablets look similar, the Lenovo Yoga is a blow of fresh air with its thoughtful design. The different standing points make it very comfortable to use in different situations. The other outstanding feature is its battery live. It is really what you need to be on the go without worrying if your gonna make through the whole day. At nearly $ 250 now, it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Wawa

customer_reviews.title: skip this tablet and buy another
customer_reviews.text: after loving this tablet for about 16 months, it is now stuck on the "Lenovo" screen and cannot get it to work. No help from manufacturer. I have since seen many complaints from others with thee same problem and no workable solutions. I would suggest to stay away from this tablet, it appears to be an intentional bug in the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck51

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo for people who do..:)
customer_reviews.text: I received my tablet today, and I must say, I love it. The functionality of the product is really great, and that what I love most about it. Before I brought the product I viewed some of the review and the quality of the screen was criticize, for me I don't see any problem, obviously it not as brilliant as a sony will be but 18 hour batter life, wow! other product can't compare. Overall, I honestly really like the product. If it last long, as I believe it will, I will be extremely satisfied buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We love this tablet. Very friendly. The cameras a are 1.6 and 5Mp so not really good for night time shots but, everything came with the price. The body feels fragile on the back but, you can buy a carbon fiber skin, and of course don't forget the s screen film protector. The stand , hold and tilt modes are a big plus. Fast connection, Bluetooth is good too. I haven't tried far yet. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Enjoying It
customer_reviews.text: So my first tablet, so no real expectations... but it really is a nice experience. Everything runs fast, videos look clear, and downloaded dolphin browser so it is just like my PC. I finally found a car mount for it. 2013 ShareMount for Tablets. The mount just barely fits in my 2011 pilot and holds the tablet quick and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been satisfied with the performance, styling and construction of this tablet.. Battery life is as advertised. Has great WiFi reception. The screen resolution is fine for everything I do. However, i am not a gamer. I have no comments concerning the capabilities there. With the onboard 16 gig and additional 32 gig micro SD this has more than adequate storage. I would recommend this tablet to anyone looking for a low to intermediate priced tablet. I don't think they would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to carry around with her, and it serves her well at home and on the go. She does a lot of volunteer activities, and this little gem is perfect for keeping track of all details, and (of course) there's an app for every activity out there. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: So far good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Lenovo Yoga 10" tablet, because of the new design were it can stand on its own, and its easier to hold with one hand. I can say that I'm satisfied with those features, they work as advertised. The tablet also performs good in all other aspects, I don't own an Ipad, but have an Acer 10", and can say the Yoga performs just as good as the Acer. So I think its a good buy, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Gordon

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC TABLET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the Lenovo Yoga tablet. Its ease of use, picture quality, and especially the battery life is really great. Never had a tablet with this much battery life. Wonderful to hold with the rounded kick stand when using it as a reader. Quick to boot up and I really like the style and look. Really are enjoying all of its qualities. It was truly worth the money and more. Thanks, Lenovo!!! Gopher 64
customer_reviews.author: Gopher69

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been an excellent purchase and pleased with its performance. I was a little hesitant on purchasing due to the reviews concerning screen quality. But the screen has a crisp and clear resolution with good color reproduction. Also, it has an outstanding battery life. This tablet maining used for surfing the web, checking email, facebooking, playing games etc.
customer_reviews.author: mamadeadlifter

customer_reviews.title: Problems with touchpad, otherwise a good unit.
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad on this tablet became sporadic a month after purchase. I thought I had the problem debugged to the fact I was using LCD cleaner on it. After I stopped cleaning it with LCD cleaner it was just a few weeks and it was working well again for a couple of months. Worked in the tropics but when I came back, it stopped working again. I have circumvented the problem by using a bluetooth keyboard (until the problem goes away again). I have the feeling it has something to do with trapped moisture, but what do I know? At least it has blue tooth so I can still use my mini keyboard when the touchpad is malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: kidosee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this tablet! For the price I paid it is undoubtedly the best deal I've ever gotten. I also decided to order the Bluetooth wireless keyboard/cover they sell as an accessory, and both of them came on the same day with very fast shipping. My one complaint: the sensor for the holding modes is wonky; it's a little annoying if it's particularly bad but I believe it has to do with being a refurbed product. overall, great!
customer_reviews.author: Jolynne Marie

customer_reviews.title: I don't get all the negitive reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding tablet as well as value. I just came from a Nexus 7 and the display is every bit as good, but from what I read i expected it to be sub par....its anything but. Is it a bit slower than the Nexus 7, yes, but not enough to really notice. I love the form factor and the fact I can use it all day and have power to spare unlike the Nexus 7. I LOVE THE YOGA!!!!! Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: GTR1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tablet. Smashed my screen up recently - my own fault - but I wouldn't be surprised if the screen had survived my recklessness. Never froze up on me and very few apps crashed, maybe once a month and never during anything important. Awesome screen resolution while indoors. Didn't use the kickstand much, but I loved it anyway. Camera wasn't so good. Battery life was very good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is excellent! I really like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is excellent ! I really like it a lot. I have already dropped it once and no damage, works fine still. The stand and battery life were the main reasons for buying it, and they are nice. My wife has a Samsung tablet and she is charging it all the time, me , I charge this thing maybe every 3 or 4 days and I use it a lot. I do not like charging stuff every day. Now she wants one too.
customer_reviews.author: Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. Case and screen look like a quality product. Screen may not be the best in the world based on what others have said, but it looks great to me watching movies. Everything loads quickly, touchscreen is sensitive and responsive. Battery life best in class. I'm no computer nerd- just need a tablet for traveling- email, movies, reservations, facebook, maps. Works great and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is the best tablet that I've ever bought. this Lenovo is very fast and have a great sound it's very easy to use. This is my wife first tablet in the past I have tried to teach her the computer but she never caught on, now she is always on the tablet having fun. This was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. It is VERY nice and easy to use. She watches a lot of movies and plays a lot of games and this tablet was perfect for that purpose. The tablet has a great battery, nice screen, and is very easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet with a little larger screen than a Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Skies Photography

customer_reviews.title: It does what I wanted it to do--it's perfect for updating social media
customer_reviews.text: It does what I wanted it to do--it's perfect for updating social media, reading books, watching television/movies, light work on documents and power points. I love the stand and the front-facing speakers. If I were doing any real work, I would recommend something else, but for the price, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Oksanen

customer_reviews.title: THis is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I havent really messed with it too much, but so far, I love it. So far, the only thing that I disliked, was that I couldnt sync all of my email accounts to it (or maybe I just havent figured out how). It is lightweight. It seems like a great ergonomic tool and I feel safer holding this than I do holding a regular tablet. The screen is nice and big, but it is also very thin. Overall, great product! I cant wait to see what else it can do! I also got this in a very timely manner!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Hit It Out Of The Park With This Tablet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. I bought one on Amazon for my wife and a week later ordered a second one for me. Super easy setup with Google gmail account. It cloned itself perfectly. Only needed gmail address and password. Everything else was automatic. Battery life is exceptional. For the price it can't be beat. And don't worry about the display either. It is perfect for a machine at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ecker

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, but slow to charge.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tablet. Still using it every day. Long battery life is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Verbeten

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Form Factor
customer_reviews.text: The small stand makes a good tablet into a great one. I regularly use it in every mode and have invented my own by hanging it in my hand by the stand. Holding it this way reduces finger fatigue noticeably. An excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: PCH

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: For the price I haven't seen anything that can remotely compare with this tablet. I have owned a few tablets and this is beautiful and functional. I would highly recommend this tablet to anyone without hesitation. More detail to follow after a couple weeks worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Wasylishen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this great looking tablet two months ago. It is working perfectly. This is my third tablet and the best one for sure. Battery lasts very long compared with my other tablets. Delivery was quick also. The build in stand is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hasik

customer_reviews.title: In any event it doesn't work and I would rather purchase another product like Samsung and get a new unit with better features ..
customer_reviews.text: After babying this device for less than two years, the Operating system failed. Of course, the company wants more than half the purchase price to repair it. Also, even though it says you can use 64 gigabytes of extended memory, only a 32 megabyte card would work. In any event it doesn't work and I would rather purchase another product like Samsung and get a new unit with better features for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Szekely

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE.... THEY KNOW ABOUT THE ISSUES AND NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE ABOUT IT
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this tablet. Google it and you will see countless occurrence of the tablet being a brick after a year. It won't boot nor charge. Some sent in their for repair and those also turned into a brick. DO NOT PURCHASE UNTIL THEY FIT THIS ISSUE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! I dropped this on the hard inside ground ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! I dropped this on the hard inside ground 4 times accidentally from a height of 3-4 feet n it still works like a charm. The case even cracked a bit. But have 2 send for repairs cuz cracked by micro usb, but still works when the cable is fenegaled.
customer_reviews.author: Detailed

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go kids school work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is third grade. He uses it with supervision and is able to navigate on his own for his homework and research. It's versatile and he can do any work that he needs. Paired with the key board, he is pleased. Performance is good enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: MtBiker

customer_reviews.title: good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: excellent battery life compared to other tablets I have used. The speed is adequate and the ability to add a microSD card greatly expands capabilities. With a Bluetooth keyboard and the built in tablet stand, this is like having a small laptop while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Bocamo

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. Its done everything I expected so far and I've had it for about a year. I bought the Bluetooth keyboard to go with it. The keyboard is a bit finicky but for the most part it's great. I love the compactness of it all. The screen has great clarity and the price?? what not to like
customer_reviews.author: NLPflug

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Battery lasts a long time and we love the built in stand. Can use it 3 different ways. Typing on it with the stand open is very comfortable. Also, works just like our droid phones but larger and faster!
customer_reviews.author: GLunerman1

customer_reviews.title: Holds a charge for days
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet for the price. I needed to replace an old tablet that I have been using because it would not hold a charge for very long. This one was perfect for me because it stays charged a very long time. Sometimes I don't have to charge it for days.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Martinez ThD

customer_reviews.title: So Far, so Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my new tablet just in time for the holidays! So far, so good! Actually I think its great based on testing it out. It is light (compared to the first one I had), sleek and smooth.....Can't wait to put it to further use.......
customer_reviews.author: Des_K

customer_reviews.title: didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my nephew's birthday last July. Within a short time he could not get it to connect online. I don't see him very often but as far as I know it still doesn't work even though I also bought the "special plan" for it.
customer_reviews.author: DeWitch

customer_reviews.title: Great $price/build and great battery life for a media tablet. What else do you want.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the GalaxyTab & iPad2 and considered this as an alternative since all I do with it is just surf the web,check email, watch streaming movies. Needed something that would last more than 7 hrs. watching movies. Both the iPad and GalaxyTab would barely make that on full brightness. GalaxyTab being the worst in battery life and would considered the iPad2 to have the best battery life except this beats them both by at least a couple of hrs. running.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O.

customer_reviews.title: meets and exceed my expectation since i went from Samsung ...
customer_reviews.text: meets and exceed my expectation since i went from Samsung galaxy 10.1 that was stolen,does everything the galaxy 10.1or any other tablet for that matter does and much much more....not a house hold name brand but i assure you you will not regret your decision to buy a Lenovo.........
customer_reviews.author: olumart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Greetings, sleek, slim, and simple to use. However, I thought the product might be a little too lite-weight for my heavy workload (it is not a laptop). However, if could afford both - this tablet and a laptop - I would purchase a Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great -still have it working-you start looking for a newer model
customer_reviews.author: aksamjr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes with all the office applications already installed. I had to install a few more. Love the look of it. IT will make my job a lot easier as a mobile bookkeeper. You can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Solano

customer_reviews.title: love the sleekness of this tablet and the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: love the sleekness of this tablet and the fact that its has the different ways to use it is great. the picture quality is great and I love the two speakers on the front on the tablet. it is easy to hold when reading a book from it. all around I love it and the price was great... would recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Quenna

customer_reviews.title: it's really easy for her to hold it with one hand
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom, she wanted an Ipad but I'm not a big IOS fan, so I choose to get her an android as she already had an S4, my mom loves this thing, it's really easy for her to hold it with one hand, the battery last for a long time, she has already had it for about 8 months now and it has not lost a step, she loves her Yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. My wife loves it so naturally, I'll have to get one for myself. Works great and the battery life is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kelly

customer_reviews.title: JUST STOP WORKING...NO REBOOT...
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited when I 1st received the tablet and 2 weeks later it just stop working, no reboot...VERY UNHAPPY w/this product. If I could have given no stars I would have. I thought according to all the reviews that I was getting a really good product, after all it is IBM - formerly at least. I guess I'm going to have to go w/Samsung as I should have originally when comparing tablets, I just didn't want to pay about $100 more, but like it is said, "you get what you pay for"!
customer_reviews.author: LoversRock2000

customer_reviews.title: Quick service! Use it everyday! Long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: glad i bought this yoga tablet for quality and built-in stand for watching videos or vertical reading of books. bought an inexpensive case custom fit for yoga at same time that fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: roland porter, jr

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like this tablet alot. I would buy it again. You can't beat the price and the service that Amazon has. It's quick and there's room for a lot of apps. There is an upgrade in settings for KitKat.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade my wife's tablet and I couldn't be any happier With this tablet, the i pad had nothing on this one. You have to see it to believe with your own eyes. ....
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga Multimode 10-inch Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It does everything I want to do and has great battery life. I don't stay on it all day, but don't have to charge the battery until 3 or 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Budman

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a present for my dad. It works ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my dad. It works well and is user friendly enough for him to be able to use. I was impressed with the quality and size when I set it up for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this tablet. I can do anything that I need to do. Hardly ever use the computer any more. This tablet does it all for me. Was going to buy a laptop. Instead I popped for this tablet. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer LCN from my kindle

customer_reviews.title: Pad review
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo pad is adequate for my uses. My only gripe is that it will freeze up from time to time. I will just restart it and it works fine. I do like its size and the way it fits my hands.
customer_reviews.author: hogbyte

customer_reviews.title: great! tablet
customer_reviews.text: very good my son is happy with it. he is using it everyday. he does so many things with it.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Turnaround was pretty quick. Decent unit otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Had some known issues. Had to send to Lenovo for service. Turnaround was pretty quick. Decent unit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: DarylSans

customer_reviews.title: Nice Intro to Tablet World
customer_reviews.text: Folding feature is great. Very clear image screen, easy operation and excellent battery life. Very good speaker system. Pricing is right on.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Collector

customer_reviews.title: Would definatly refer
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 because I don't use it. I gave it to my husband for Christmas. He has never had a tablet or anything like it. It has been really easy for him to use and learn on. The picture is just fine. The battery last a long time. Which is really nice for him. If I were to get a tablet for myself I would go with a Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mensink

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for several months and it has worked great. I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for several months and it has worked great. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: I loved this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tablet. Unfortunately, at some point it stopped charging, the port had no prongs as they had all broken inside the machine. I wanted to return but I landed on it in an accident. Still, I would buy it agian.
customer_reviews.author: C.Williams

customer_reviews.title: tablet works fine
customer_reviews.text: i previously wrote that the tablet will not pair-up jamplus wireless speakers, all i had to do was push the reset button on each speaker, problem solved. the tablet is excellant.
customer_reviews.author: batman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Responsive; super-comfortable to hold, tilt, or stand (and doesn't need a weird cover to stand); screen is bright. For the price it's a superb tablet.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: the tablet works good but no longer than 7 months I gave to ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it, the tablet works good but no longer than 7 months I gave to this product five stars in the beginig, after a while it will not turn on and a message that the tablet is in meta will mode appear. Google this and you will see thtat it's a very common.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel A.

customer_reviews.title: ... figured out the nuaces of Jellybean I came to love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out the nuaces of Jellybean I came to love this tablet. I am still looking for a nicely rated bluetooth keyboard though
customer_reviews.author: soilchemist

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market - so far!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. So good it is replacing my laptop. Does everything, easier to use than laptop and far better picture-brighter color.
customer_reviews.author: country girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting battery life. I added a 32GB SD card to hold data. I needed something with GPS when away in the woods with no cell or wifi. Movies run fine and stream well.
customer_reviews.author: Bach

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very solid tablet for the price. It was recommended to me by a salesman at Fry's but I wasn't ready to pull the trigger. When I saw at this site for nearly $50 less when I was ready to buy it became a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my yoga 10. I was a little Leary after reading some PC magazine reviews but when I read other amazon customer reviews I decided to try it. I love it just as much as my husbands Google nexus 10. Only down fall is no flash on camera.
customer_reviews.author: CAMILLE TRICHIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet, long battery life, outstanding graphics, and perfect for movies/books/email/games/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Really needs a 1080p screen
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really needs a 1080p screen. I knew it didn't have one when I bought it and still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: jsj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my 82 y.o mother to keep in touch with the family trough social media, and it is a very good tablet. She is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: scubanuts

customer_reviews.title: got good user out of it
customer_reviews.text: great pad. got good use out of it before my son killed it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: City Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reliable
customer_reviews.text: A keeper. Very nice and reliable. Returned two others from other manufacturers before finding this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shegnada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tablet. works well and the battery life holds what it promises
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Lots of built in memory. Long battery life. Did a lot of research and this is the best tablet. Convenient kick stand. Nice picture. Good speakers. Looks very professional. Quick processing.
customer_reviews.author: jette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Like the kick stand. Easy to use and great battery life. Recommend it as a browsing device. Video is not great
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting it to clip on to the tablet as a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet. I've played around with an older android 7" and this is everything that one could never be. The screen is big and crisp. I love this tablet, and have no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome-O 2000

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law loves the tablet she is constantly on it and love the battery life whenever she goes out it goes with her
customer_reviews.author: isabelxescobar01

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend as you can't beat this price for a tablet
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is outstanding. Recharges quickly too. Highly recommend as you can't beat this price for a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent styling, handling, ease of use, and battery life! Fast internet access. Android operating system is familiar and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James McGuane

customer_reviews.title: the best tablet in market
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good tablet, look no more, this one it's by far the best out there, I have other tablets, well had, I give them away, the resolution, the sound and the most important, the battery duration makes this tablet the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, lightweight, extremely long battery life, very comfortable to hold. Love the stand. Great tablet at a very reasonable price! Just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I feel so happy with this product, but I have a question how I know if the tablet is new or it had an old owner?
customer_reviews.author: yen

customer_reviews.title: A very good budget Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Looong battery life, easy to use stand Impressive speakers for a tablet. A little slow than Ipad air, but nothing major. a 4.8 star (round up to five)
customer_reviews.author: Linhao Wu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is great. No problems. I did end up giving it to my daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the money. Good choice for me.I was surprised how many people had this tablet or wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: Lenovo Yoga Multimode 10-inch Tablet
product_meta.description:
The world's first multi-mode tablet, the Lenovo Yoga Tablet 10, features a unique kickstand and battery that allow comfortable use in three different modes - Hold for reading, Stand for viewing and Tilt for playing games, for up to 18hrs on a single charge.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Multiple usage modes: Hold, Tilt, and Stand
16 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars470 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
